instructions: Tap the chart, then tap Edit Data (you may need to tap the Show More Items button to see it). Do any of the following: Add a data series: Tap cells, then enter the data for your new data series. Remove a data series: Tap the colored bar for the row or column you want to delete, then tap Delete. Reorder data series: Drag the colored bar for the data series you want to move. Enter dates, times, and durations: Tap the Configure button , turn on Full Keyboard, then enter your data. Tap Done to return to the chart.
Tap the chart, then tap Edit Data. Tap the Configure button , then tap Plot Rows as Series or Plot Columns as Series. Tap Done, then tap Done again to return to the chart.
Tap the chart to select it, then tap Edit Data. Tap the Configure button , then tap Share X Values. Tap Done, then tap Done again to return to the chart.

Image titled See an SSL Certificate in Chrome Step 5 1 Open Chrome. It s the round red, yellow, green and blue icon typically found on the home screen or in the app drawer (Android). Image titled See an SSL Certificate in Chrome Step 6 2 Navigate to the website. When the site is finished loading, a padlock icon will appear at the top-left corner of the browser. Image titled See an SSL Certificate in Chrome Step 7 3 Tap the padlock icon. A menu will appear. Image titled See an SSL Certificate in Chrome Step 8 4 Tap . Another menu will expand. Image titled See an SSL Certificate in Chrome Step 9 5 Tap . This opens the certificate viewer, which displays all of the certificate information. Advertisement
